name: Hexderity
description:
The clock is ticking - find matching pairs of hexagons to buy yourself time. With bold visuals and electrifying audio, prepare to enter a trance and emerge a master.

"An inventive indie game that aims to test both your reflexes and memory skills." - The Observer / Guardian

"Hexderity makes you want to move fast and you need to if you want to survive." - AppAdvice

Features

  • 6 stages to test your physical and mental agility
  • 20 powerful upgrades to unlock
  • An intense soundtrack from Drum and Bass producer ISO
  • Trippy, tessellating visuals that are both bold and bright
  • Flexible play sessions to fill any sized gap in your day

Best played on a touchscreen!

Game by: Ben Nizan

Audio by: Ben "ISO" Siegal

Icons from: Snap2Objects.com
